name: Magic Legacy - Christmas Edition Matching Charming King Mania
name_original: Magic Legacy - Christmas Edition Matching Charming King Mania
description:
Brilliant/Beautiful/Awesome matching games where you can solve hundreds of puzzles to defeat the Gummy Bear to become the king of the beautiful magic land!
Play it with friends in the Christmas Season!

Magic Legacy is completely free to play but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment. You can turn-off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

New features released with current version:

● Complete different targets to win the level before you run out of moves.
● Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master.
● Acres of luscious levels to complete.
● Take on your friends to compete for the best score and see who can switch their way to the fattest onions ever!
● Rechargeable boosters, extra moves and special power-ups to help with those challenging levels.

Play Magic Legacy today and join millions enjoying the latest touch craze!
